symbol for reproduction number: the average number of people that one person with a particular disease infects: An R of less than 1 means that the virus will eventually die out. R was estimated to be 1.46 for H1N1 in 2009. The key R rate of measuring COVID-19 spread rose owing to care home infections.
More examplesFewer examplesThe aim of the new technology is to keep the "R" down.If R is less than 1, each existing infection causes less than one new infection.R is not fixed - it changes as immunity develops.

R adjective [not gradable]
(MOVIE)
abbreviation for restricted Note: Used in the US for movies that people under the age of 17 will not be allowed in to see except if they are with an adult.
